amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 as en bloc: Nos. 3, 6, 7, 8, 10, 13, 16, 17, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25, 26, 27, 28, 31, 33, 34, 35, 36, 40, 41, 47, 49, 51, 60, and 61.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amodei amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Amodei.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Amodei amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
